channel.name: Astro Rania MY
channel.title: Ikrar Cinta Suci
channel.desc: Alika, who was 7 months pregnant, and her husband Arka experienced tragedy during the tsunami, which resulted in Alika losing her baby and Arka falling into a coma. The tragedy reminded Alika of her childhood trauma, while Arka also faced a similar trauma that recurred after the tsunami. The mental problems they experienced caused tension in their marriage, especially with Alika's mother-in-law Wirda blaming her.
